Headline: Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier track switching problems at Ashland/Lake. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier track switching problems at Ashland/Lake. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Delays Affecting Pink Line Trains
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are running with delays after earlier track switching problems at Ashland/Lake. Crews working to restore normal service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are running with delays from congestion after earlier track switching problems at Ashland/Lake. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Crews are working to clear the congestion that's formed and restore normal travel times through the area.

Allow extra travel time.
